fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a living player to Commemorate. This lasts until they die.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When a Commemorated target dies, they may give two players a Bouquet.
- Boquets will unleash their curse when the holder is visited. The holder and all visitors are roleblocked. This consumes the Bouquet.
- The Bouquet cannot scare evil attackers.
- After a player has been scared by a Bouquet, they will no longer fear it. In the future, they will no longer be roleblocked by Bouquets (but can still trigger them).
- Retain your Background upon being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.
